title.us: Build a linear regression model using pandas and python
title.es: Tutorial: Construye un modelo de regresion lineal usando pandas y python

description.us: Learn how to build a linear regression model from scratch: understand a new dataset, perform exploratory data analysis (EDA), model the data, and optimize your model. Discover how the $R^2$ evolves by adjusting the Lasso model's hyperparameter up to a value of 20.
